website_summaries.verdict: A solid, wireless barcode scanner with a long lasting battery and reliable connectivity.
pros: Comes programmed to recognize 10 different types of barcodes
Battery lasts around 2 weeks, with consistent use
Can even recognize some broken or obscured barcodes
cons: Included cradle stand is lightweight and unstable as it moves when receiving the scanner

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Square POS
customer_reviews.text: This would have been great purchase had it worked with Square. Unfortunately I didn't open the box and try it before the eligible return date because we were setting up our store. Make sure you read the fine print and ask questions before your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mlarkin

customer_reviews.title: Rapid trigger or rapid scanning causes stuttered beeping
customer_reviews.text: After 7 months of use, this very curious behavior has appeared: if you pull the trigger more than 3 times per second, or if you scan barcodes rapidly, the scanner beeps rapidly and fails to parse any further barcode scans. The only way out is to power the scanner off and then on again. But, you can trigger this behavior the same way again immediately. Is there a warranty for this unit?
customer_reviews.author: Jason R

customer_reviews.title: This scanner was easy to set-up
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd bluethooth barcode scanner model that I have purchased - the first 2 model did not stay paired when my tablet was in sleep mode or after a restart. This scanner was easy to set-up, very clear instructions and did not disconnect pairing from off mode or sleep mode. I love that it has a power button. Reads barcodes (code 39) with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mary V.

customer_reviews.title: The scanner itself is very nice.
customer_reviews.text: The advertisement stated that a customization prefix could be set. The documentation only contains instruction for setting up several prefixes and then says to down load more prefix/suffixes from their site, but their sight doesn't include and such documentation. The scanner itself is very nice. Update: Support emailed me back (within 5 hours) with steps to do a firmware update. This allowed me to program the scanner as needed. I'm upping this rating to five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Higher price but way higher value verse cheaper device
customer_reviews.text: Double the price but on battery, connectivity and durability already won the battle with other 3x dollar products on Amazon. Spend the extra for some real bluetooth device to save yourself hassle free of buying another gun during critical moment. The device is smaller and weight the same. The power plug is easier to access amd scan pick up is faster. Easy installation and full desc manual make easy for adding or changing function
customer_reviews.author: hoi

customer_reviews.title: Need to turn off the scanner when typing on Ipad
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a little bit hassle when you have to turn off the scanner in order to type something on Ipad. Ipad detects this scanner as a Bluetooth keyboard so you can either typing or scanning but not at the same time. I bought 3 of these scanner and connect with Ipad in order to work with my company system, and they are such a great combination. The battery lasts long well enough. I charge it every week so it may last even longer than that. When working with the returns packages is wear and tear barcode, this kind of scanner can easily scan these barcode without any problem. Worth the money and best quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Phan

customer_reviews.title: Decent for non robust use
customer_reviews.text: Using in warehouse setting for pick/pack operation. Worked very well out of the box but quickly showed signs that robust use was not good for it; did not want to scan as quickly or accurately with same products and barcodes after very short time. We have the ones we purchased as backups now and stationed more permanently at infrequent use desks to scan barcodes when entering new items into our pack/scan/inventory program rather than hand typing.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a great scanner. It works with the different types of barcodes I need to use. It's easy to use, connects quickly to my ipad, and has plenty of battery life. Unlike most "wireless" barcode scanners this one actually connects via bluetooth so I'm able to connect it to an ipad and does so at a much lower price point that comparable devices. It's lightweight but not flimsy and is easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, Bluetooth not as great.
customer_reviews.text: The product works great, yet make sure you have the barcode To scan to your spreadsheet. The Bluetooth does not seem to work great. But the plug and play was very quick and accurate. Or use it to scan barcodes on product that I send out I can scan 300 barcodes in less than 45 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: deman60

customer_reviews.title: Speed. Accuracy. Ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: I have/had 5 different scanners including Motorola, Socket mobile, Honeywell, etc. Among those, Honeywell usb wired and this Inateck wireless are the top performer. It reads fast & accurate on any surface. (I am frustrated with Socket scanners). Ease of use. Instant connect/disconnect. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rat eat bee

customer_reviews.title: Good budget device
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. The manual power switch is a very smart design choice since it prevents accidental trigger presses while the device is in the holster or bag. Read distance and decode ability are on par with others in this price range. We are using a number of them at a warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: coppersleeve

customer_reviews.title: Very Functional USB and Bluetooth Barcode Scanner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to be used in testing web and desktop applications that my team develops. The overall build quality is very good and the option of using Bluetooth or USB is extremely helpful. I ran into a few issues with scanning special characters and reached out to Inateck support. They were very helpful in troubleshooting our special configuration requirement and were very responsive to emails.
customer_reviews.author: DONALD M BAKKE

customer_reviews.title: The scanner that does
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and scans what I needed it to. I had to scan the booklet for the barcodes I was using, but it works. Now I have to remember not to lose the booklet, in case I need to reset up the scanner, need a different barcode....
customer_reviews.author: Laura Reed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality performance and build. 100% satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. The unit is very well built. Not too heavy or too light. I've used a lot of different Wireless scanners in my business and they're like cheap toys compared to this scanner. The action itself is very responsive and has had no trouble reading any codes. This has been used at a fast pace Warehouse setting scanning up to 2000 scans a day. I will be ordering these from now on as we need more scanners.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brown

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST BT scanner for iPad connection and uae.
customer_reviews.text: Inatec finally got a BT scanner right. The best scanner for iPad use. It connects effortlessly. It has all the features I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Reluctant Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: best product. really does what it says. Directions were a little unclear at the beginning but the ball rolled and know its great!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Lipman

customer_reviews.title: Great Scanner Very easy to pair Connects very fast
customer_reviews.text: So far, Great Scanner Very easy to pair Connects very fast! Scans very fast and accurately Nice audio feedback to let you know scan was successful (Beeps Loudly) Have only had it for about 1 month. If it holds up for prolonged use over time,,,, I would definitely recommend buying this scanner.
customer_reviews.author: ScanTechSolutions

customer_reviews.title: Feels solid, scans fast, good scan range
customer_reviews.text: We started with a cheaper scanner and this one is significantly better. It feels solid, it scans fast even at a distance, and it can scan barcodes more consistently than the other cheapo scanner we were using. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: voiceafx

customer_reviews.title: Excellent range, battery and strong tool .
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to set and use, very reliable and range is excellent. Great buy , Monica.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Puppy Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great economical bluetooth barcode scanner
customer_reviews.text: This seems to work as well as more expensive bluetooth "big name" 1d barcode scanners, at least for now (3 months). Won't work with some iOS POS applications like Sh_pi_y, but works great for general inventory and price control.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Telomere

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my POS System with an ipad, and it works perfectly. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: It is I

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit, good range
customer_reviews.text: We're using this scanner for management of field equipment - check-out, check-in. We bought a very inexpensive Bluetooth dongle for a desktop computer, and we're able to communicate between scanner and computer even when stepping into another room with steel-stud wall construction. Very impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm W.

customer_reviews.title: Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to charge but after that no issues
customer_reviews.author: Theda C Tolles

customer_reviews.title: Great Scanner with a long range.
customer_reviews.text: Very good Bar Code Reader that has a very long scan range.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Pickett

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and works well - plenty setup options in in manual
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: Nice documentation as well
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat the price for a Bluetooth scanner. Works as expected. Nice documentation as well. It is simple to use and depending on your needs, will be a good choice. As in any scanner, I would not drop it.
customer_reviews.author: Alan W.

customer_reviews.title: Great, reliable scanner.
customer_reviews.text: This scanner has been very reliable. I’ve purchased many over the past couple of years. I use them in a kiosk application with an iPAD in a lab and they’ve been working out great!
customer_reviews.author: DoodhReal

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!!
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is absolutely awesome!! I needed serial numbers put into a Word document and all I had to do is place the cursor where I wanted the barcode to be, scan it, done. Made doing inventory a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Feel Solid, Act really fast
customer_reviews.text: This is a really solid piece. Even the price is higher than the others but I think it worth it! It scans fast and accurately. I have different brand scanner but I think this is the best one so far.
customer_reviews.author: YoSpot

customer_reviews.title: Package Operations scanning
customer_reviews.text: Purchased scanners for a high volume hospitality/meeting/convention job. Over 2000+ FedEx/UPS AND various freight barcodes scanned into our system without a glitch. Surely will purchase a couple more for our operation.
customer_reviews.author: George Carter

customer_reviews.title: Read the Specs Carefully
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item to compliment my Square POS system did not link up. Read the specs carefully and try to reach customer service before buying so you don't waste your time as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This device works great in both bluetooth and wired mode.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Most of the time the scanner has good range, good battery life and is easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Most of the time the scanner has good range, good battery life and is easy to use, however, it has a bad habit of unpairing itself and it. Takes a while to repair it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Gortmaker

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as needed
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work as intended. Hooks up fine, but the book that comes with it showing instructions of how to enter commands after scanning doesn't work. Now it is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Pays for itself, great value, works well
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, real value. This product paid for itself many times over in just a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Cornel

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: if you double click it brings up a bunch of items???
customer_reviews.author: M A DJENDOU

customer_reviews.title: works awesome...long battery
customer_reviews.text: - it will last all day use. - does not scan bar codes on screen - very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Momin

customer_reviews.title: Great except with Apple
customer_reviews.text: We have continually had issues with these with Apple products but no concerns what so ever with android or Microsoft products.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Using these on our shop floor. It was super easy to set up and pair with our ipads. Seems durable, scans quickly & easily.
customer_reviews.author: V. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect value for cost
customer_reviews.text: Size is only dislike but it was cheapest and got the job done so no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Owen moberg

customer_reviews.title: Very prompt customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Still need to find time to work this out, but they are helpful in the process.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Lee

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth seems to be just as good as USB and you don't loose one of your USB ports.
customer_reviews.text: The scanner that this replaced was a Inateck that I used daily for 5 years and I'm glad I stayed with them.
customer_reviews.author: Dan-O

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: We bought a total of 5 of these, all are set to be on all the time and are plugged in for power. One of them just stops scanning over time although it is still on and the red beam is on. Tablet shows is is still blue tooth connected but to fix it, I have to turn off the scanner and turn it back on. Again, only 1 out of 5 is like that.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: works great with blue tooth. If you do not have blue tooth capability, still works, just have to keep plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: jam

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Not too tuff to set up and great deal at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carson Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Not Connecting
customer_reviews.text: Please contact me. I’m unable to connect device with my Square Pos system. I read manual and followed instructions
customer_reviews.author: Allix

customer_reviews.title: Product great
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Had major problem with Amazon concerning shipping but the product is great
customer_reviews.author: Sort

customer_reviews.title: Works but is annoying when you go to use it for The first ...
customer_reviews.text: Works but is annoying when you go to use it for The first time of the day or after it has been sitting
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Carli

customer_reviews.title: After 2 months - it's dead.
customer_reviews.text: Won't stay connected. I had bought 2 of these, and they are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Kinney

customer_reviews.title: ... 15 to 20 days on the battery i a happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: price and item are 100 as describe 15 to 20 days on the battery i a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Although initially, this does not work for Shopify POS, after a day, it was okay.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Not good for Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Constantly disconnected from Bluetooth. Was hard ty reconnect once it disconnected.
customer_reviews.author: John Bolthouse

customer_reviews.title: Needs to work over a longer distance
customer_reviews.text: The Barcode Scanner works really well up close but fails at what should be reasonable distances.
customer_reviews.author: mickey w.

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work with Square POS
customer_reviews.text: In the Questions and Answers, they say it should work with Square. It WILL NOT work with Square POS.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible
customer_reviews.text: Unable to use as it was not compatible with my POS system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well with excel, I use it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well with excel, I use it to keep track of inventory. We use a barcode on tamper proof stick on tags. The battery last a long time o . A full charge. Would buy again. Quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: StarchaserKoa

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't work like my other scanner
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work like my other scanner. It scans a different code, and I can't get it to scan the same way.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie Deines

customer_reviews.title: Worked great right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Hooked up to our pc right out of the box and it worked perfectly with our software. Connected immediately to android phone via bluetooth, scans very quickly and accurately
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Inateck Bluetooth Barcode Scanner, Working Time Approx. 15 Days, 35m Range, Automatic Fast and Precise scanning, BCST-70 …
feature_bullets: Easy to Deploy: Out of the box. Connection completes in 3 seconds. Supports English, German, French, Italian, and Spanish keyboard. Compatible with POS, iOS, Android, Windows, Mac OS, Linux, and Raspberry Pi etc.
Strong Recognition Ability: Can read various types of 1D barcode. Supports lightning scanning and upload of blurry or broken barcodes under strong and dim light.
Prolonged Battery Life and Connection Distance: Full charge allows 15 continuous working days. Less downtime, no shift interruptions. Connection distance reaches above 35 meters.

Built to Last: External TPU protective case is 2 times as thick as similar products. Triple consolidation treatment is made for internal core parts. Withstands repeated 6ft. (1.8m) drops to concrete floor.

Special Functions: Editable prefix or suffix reaches 32 digits. Capable of hiding part of a barcode . You can also contact us to customize the product to suit your specific need. For more information, please refer to Product Description.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars254 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
